metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14947 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: OCS Inventory NG 2.7 allows Remote Command Execution via shell metacharacters to require/commandLine/CommandLine.php because mib_file in plugins/main_sections/ms_config/ms_snmp_config.php is mishandled in get_mib_oid.

notes.Note: sbeattie> OCS Inventory should only be run in a trusted environment.

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
